alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 6:12AM EST until December 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...In New York, Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Steuben, Schuyler, Chemung, Tompkins and Tioga counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford and Wyoming counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates
